Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I use GenAI to help me refine my work down into the word count etc so a teacher is not going to help me with those reviews

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The teacher has set the requirement so will always interpret the assignment in the way that was intended. AI can only help you interpret that based on your existing knowledge.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI provides much more detail, and attempts to explain the why, where teachers provide vague short answers
